puppeteer.connect.description: Attaches Puppeteer to an existing Chromium instance

puppeteer.launch.description: Creates a Chromium instance and attaches Puppeteer to it

browser.close.description: Closes Chromium and all of its pages

browser.disconnect.description: Disconnects Puppeteer from the browser, but leaves the Chromium process running

browser.newPage.description: Resolves a new page with the default browser context

browser.on('disconnected').description: Emitted when Puppeteer gets disconnected from the Chromium instance

page.$eval.description: Runs `document.querySelector` within the page and passes the result as the first argument to a function

page.$$eval.description: Runs `document.querySelectorAll` within the page and passes the results as the first argument to a function

page.browser.description: Returns the browser the page belongs to

page.click.description: Clicks in the center of an element within the page

page.content.description: Returns the full HTML contents of the page

page.emulate.description: Emulates a given device metrics and user agent within the page

page.emulateMedia.description: Changes the CSS media type of the page

page.evaluate.description: Evaluates a function in the page context

page.focus.description: Focuses an element within the page

page.goBack.description: Navigates to the previous page in the history

page.goForward.description: Navigates to the next page in the history

page.goto.description: Navigates the page to a URL

page.hover.description: Hovers over the center of an element within the page

page.keyboard.down.description: Dispatches a `keydown` event within the page

page.keyboard.press.description: Presses on a specific key within the page

page.keyboard.sendCharacter.description: Dispatches a `keypress` and `input` event within the page

page.keyboard.type.description: Types a text into a focused element within the page

page.keyboard.up.description: Dispatches a `keyup` event within the page

page.mouse.click.description: Clicks on area within the page by coordinates

page.mouse.down.description: Dispatches a `mousedown` event within the page

page.mouse.move.description: Dispatches a `mousemove` event within the page

page.mouse.up.description: Dispatches a `mouseup` event within the page

page.pdf.description: Generates a PDF from the page

page.screenshot.description: Generates a screenshot of the page

page.waitFor.description: Waits until an element/predicate/timeout within the page is resolved

page.waitForFunction.description: Waits until a predicate within the page returns a truthy value

page.waitForNavigation.description: Waits until the page navigates to a new URL or reloads

page.waitForRequest.description: Waits until a request by URL/predicate is resolved

page.waitForResponse.description: Waits until a response by URL/predicate is resolved

page.waitForSelector.description: Waits until an element (by selector) is appeared in the page

page.waitForXPath.description: Waits until an element (by XPath) is appeared in the page

page.on('close').description: Emitted when the page is closed

page.on('console').description: Emitted when a script within the page calls one of console API methods

page.on('dialog').description: Emitted when a dialog appears in the page

page.on('domcontentloaded').description: Emitted when the `DOMContentLoaded` event of the page is dispatched

page.on('frameattached').description: Emitted when a frame within the page is attached

page.on('framedetached').description: Emitted when a frame within the page is detached

page.on('framenavigated').description: Emitted when a frame within the page is navigated to a new url

page.on('load').description: Emitted when the `load` event of the page is dispatched

page.on('metrics').description: Emitted when a script within the page invokes `console.timeStamp`

page.on('pageerror').description: Emitted when an uncaught exception happens within the page

page.on('popup').description: Emitted when the page opens a new tab or window

page.on('request').description: Emitted when the request is issued by the page

page.on('requestfinished').description: Emitted when a request finishes successfully

page.on('response').description: Emitted when a response is received

page.on('workercreated').description: Emitted when a dedicated `WebWorker` is spawned by the page

page.on('workerdestroyed').description: Emitted when a dedicated `WebWorker` is terminated

Examples - basic.description: Creates a basic usage example of a page

Examples - navigating by URL.description: Creates an example of page navigation by URL
